description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nParity:
If your creatures have {ACTION_cast} an even number of spells, 30% of their {STAT_speed} is added to their spells' potency. If your creatures have {ACTION_cast} an odd number of spells, 30% of their {STAT_defense} is added to their spells' potency. This trait does not stack.
name: Integerite
